title: Microsoft and Discord, Goldman Sachs' junior bankers and a listener mail question on news consumption
description:
Kara and Scott talk about Microsoft's potential acquisition of the video gaming social platform Discord. They also preview the big tech hearings on disinformation. Meanwhile, Scott thinks Goldman Sachs junior employees should "buck up", even though Kara thinks "work-life-balance" priorities might be shifting in our culture. In listener mail, Kara and Scott talk about how they consume the news.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
